features.title: All in one place
features.description: Efiriyad app comes with all the features of Pronote and Skolengo combined. You will find everything you need to lead a successfully school year, all in one app.

notifications.title: Realtime notifications
notifications.description: Efiriyad app is built to support realtime notifications. We will notify you when a new activity appears, such as a new grade or a new homework.
